name: Mysterious Stranger :
dialogue: I see you have been making your way through this dungeon.

name: Mysterious Stranger :
dialogue: As you might expect, you need a key to open the door to the next level

name: Mysterious Stranger :
dialogue: And as it so happens, I have the key!

name: Mysterious Stranger :
dialogue: You can have it if you bring me 5 gold

name: Mysterious Stranger :
dialogue: You don't have enough gold yet. There are chests with gold inside of them, press E to open them
